org.openide.awt

Class HtmlBrowser.Impl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openide.awt.HtmlBrowser.Impl
  • Enclosing class:
    HtmlBrowser

    public abstract static class HtmlBrowser.Impl
extends Object
    This interface represents an implementation of html browser used in HtmlBrowser. Each BrowserImpl implementation corresponds with some BrowserFactory implementation.

      • getLocation

        public String getLocation()
        Retrieve current browser location. It doesn't have to be a valid URL, e.g. "about:config".
        Returns:
        Browser location or null.
        Since:
        7.13

      • setLocation

        public void setLocation(String location)
        Change current browser location.
        Parameters:
        location - New location to show in the browser. It doesn't have to be a valid URL, e.g. "about:config" may be accepted as well.
        Since:
        7.13

        Is forward button enabled?

        public abstract void forward()
        Moves the browser forward. Failure is ignored.

        Is backward button enabled?
        Returns:
        true if it is

        public abstract void backward()
        Moves the browser forward. Failure is ignored.

        public abstract void removePropertyChangeListener(PropertyChangeListener l)
        Removes PropertyChangeListener from this browser.
        Parameters:
        l - Listener to remove.

      • dispose

        public void dispose()
        Method invoked by the infrastructure when the browser component is no longer needed. The default implementation does nothing.
        Since:
        7.11

      • getLookup

        public Lookup getLookup()
        The content of this Lookup will be merged into browser's TopComponent Lookup.
        Returns:
        Browser's Lookup
        Since:
        7.52
